import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const serverUrl = process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL; function ForgotPassword({ theme }) { const [sent, setSent] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { axios.put(`${serverUrl}/`); }, []); return (
Forgot Passsword
 ); } export default ForgotPassword;
